participant_1.background:
I love bananas because they're sweet and portable.
I get along with my family, despite our differences.
I've been working at my parents' business since I was a kid, so I've got a lot of experience in the field.
i just bought a new house with my partner.
i do yoga every morning.

participant_2.background:
I love being in nature, which helps me clear my mind and relax after a long day of gaming.
i enjoy shopping.
i play games at the arcade , still.
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
i live in a house in the country.

content.text: Hi! My day is going well, thanks for asking. How about you?
It's going great! I just bought a new house with my partner.
Congratulations! That's awesome. Do you like it?
Yes, I love it! It's in the country, so it's really peaceful and quiet.
That sounds perfect. I love being in nature.
Me too! I love going for walks in the woods and hiking.
That's great! I love hiking too. I'm actually going to the mountains this weekend.
That sounds fun. I'm jealous! I wish I could go with you.
You can come with me! I'd love to have you.
Oh, I'd love that! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! I'm glad you're excited.
Me too! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too! It'll be a lot of fun
